abstract: Forceful personality of New York Giants safety Antrel Rolle, two-time Pro Bowler and team's leading tackler, has helped him assume a leadership role with the team.
snippet: The forceful personality of Antrel Rolle, the Giants’ leading tackler, has helped him assume a leadership role with the team.
lead_paragraph: The forceful personality of Antrel Rolle, the Giants’ leading tackler, has helped him assume a leadership role with the team.

headline.main: Rolle Stands Out With Punishing Hits and Pugnacious Talk
headline.print_headline: Rolle Stands Out With Punishing Hits and Pugnacious Talk
headline.seo: Giants’ Rolle Dishes Punishing Hits and Pugnacious Talk
